    1: from typing import Any
    2: 
    3: from pandas import Index
    4: 
    5: 
    6: def allow_na_ops(obj: Any) -> bool:
    7:     """Whether to skip test cases including NaN"""
    8:     is_bool_index = isinstance(obj, Index) and obj.inferred_type == "boolean"
    9:     return not is_bool_index and obj._can_hold_na
